short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fun Piano Extension for Chrome, which supports both mouse and keyboard keys to play. (s-j) and (z-m)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Piano Extension for Chrome, which supports both mouse and keyboard keys to play. Use keyboard keys (s-j) for playing black keys and (z-m) keyboard keys for playing white keys. Take your time off work and have some fun!
